# tlspc Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "tlspc" {
  apikey   = ""
  endpoint = "https://api.venafi.eu"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `apikey` (String) API Key

### Optional

- `endpoint` (String) TLSPC API Endpoint
